ValidationRule.description: you can only create an opportunity against an advertiser account
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
$Setup.byPass__c.ByPass_Validation__c = FALSE, NOT(Account.Record_Type_Text__c = 'Advertiser'),
OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_DIRECT, RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_PROGRAMMATIC, RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_PMP )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This is not an advertiser account.
